lead_paragraph: Austria said Wednesday that it had put a cap on the number of refugees it wanted to accept — 37,500 this year and a total of 127,500 through 2019.
snippet: Austria said Wednesday that it had put a cap on the number of refugees it wanted to accept — 37,500 this year and a total of 127,500 through 2019.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis

abstract: Austrian government announces cap on number of refugees it will accept in 2016--37,500, and total of 127,500 through 2019.
